io.apptik.rhub - package io.apptik.rhub
 

R

removeUpstream(Object, P) - Method in interface io.apptik.rhub.RHub
Unsubscribe upstream publisher from a Proxy
removeUpstream(Object) - Method in interface io.apptik.rhub.RHub
Unsubscribe all upstream subscriptions from a Proxy
resetProxy(Object) - Method in interface io.apptik.rhub.RHub
removes the Proxy and frees the topic space and send onComplete (if the proxy allows it) to all its Subscribers
RHub<P> - Interface in io.apptik.rhub
Reactive Hub is a collection of multi-receiver and multi-producer Proxies connecting Publishers and Subscribers so that Subscribers can receive events without knowledge of which Publishers, if any, there are, while maintaining easily identifiable connection between them.
RHub.ProxyType<R extends io.apptik.roxy.Roxy> - Interface in io.apptik.rhub
Proxy Type identifies the proxy behaviour.
